text:
A revised three-day census on those involved in removing night soil will be taken in the district from Monday. In an official release here on Sunday, Murali, Municipal Commissioner, said that the census aimed at rehabilitating those involved in clearing the night soil, open septic tanks and the railway tracks. He had appealed to the members of the public to utilise the census. Officials from the municipality will assist the needy in filling up the forms for the census, the release added.

Special gram sabha

on February 26

A special grama sabha will be held at 497 village panchayats in the district on February 26. In a release here on Sunday, S. Ganesh, District Collector, said the gram sabha, among other things, will identify the additional beneficiaries for the construction of houses newly sanctioned under the Indira Awaj Yojana to benefit those hit by the recent floods. The meeting will enlist the households without the individual toilet facility.
title: Census of safai karamcharis
